Description:

A two player puzzler were one player is in a workshop repairing randomly generated robots, while the other player has access to the manual/solutions to the puzzle found in the repairing process. 

How to play:

  • both players need to download the .zip folder
  • inside is both the executable and manual
  • extract the .zip
  • players will need to have voice communication. We recommend Microsoft Teams or Discord for online calls
  • choose roles;
    • player one starts the executable
    • player two opens the manual

At this point, you are ready to play! Player one inside the workshop needs to relay the puzzle information to player two, who will have the puzzle/repair manual.
